definition: the Arrow (a Hong Kong registered ship involved in historical incident in 1856 used as pretext for the second Opium War)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
the Arrow Incident of 1856 (used as pretext for the second Opium War)
